title: [Large-Scale] Project-Based Learning Design and Implementation Based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory knowledge of educational principles and basic learning theories
context.additional_context: Hybrid (in-person/online) environment, diverse student backgrounds, support from university educational innovation centers

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core principles of UDL (engagement, representation, action & expression) to actual projects
Learners can collaboratively design project-based learning that considers diverse learning needs
Learners can develop UDL strategies utilizing digital tools and incorporate peer feedback

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines Document

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
